GV03sb_13_u:272: yajamānamaraṇyam mṛtaṃ haranti na yajñaveśasam bhavati 13.2.4.[4]

GV03sb_13_u:280: tadāhuḥ anavaruddho vā etasya saṃvatsaro bhavati yo'nyatra cāturmāsyebhyaḥ

GV03sb_13_u:356: sugebhiriti devayānānevainam patho darśayati yatrāsate sukṛto yatra te yayuriti

GV03sb_13_u:358: loke dadhāti prajāpataye tvā juṣṭam prokṣāmītyupāṃśvathopagṛhṇāti 13.2.7.[13]
